description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Trippin' Alien is easy to learn, but impossible to master.  Play on 4 difficulty levels through 4 different game modes, including Survival, TimeAttack, Retro, and Practice. Customize your ship with 5 different colors, and track your high scores over time, all to an awesome original soundtrack by Daniel Gooding.
description.short: Trippin' Alien is easy to learn, but impossible to master.  Play on 4 difficulty levels through 4 different game modes, including Survival, TimeAttack, Retro, and Practice. Customize your ship with 5 different colors, and track your high scores over time, all to an awesome original soundtrack by Daniel Gooding.
